replies.body:
I see it more simply:

{{champion:44}} "It's tragic isn't it Pantheon.  To see the sun and the moon chase each other forever, never to meet."
{{champion:80}} "It certainly is, I'd pay to see that action."
{{champion:44}} "Sun and moon together, their light playing off each other in the cool, crisp morning...  Ah, it would be beautiful."
{{champion:80}} "Finally expressing their feelings, cuddled against each other, caressing one another's..."  *Trails off.*
{{champion:44}} "Wait, what are you talking about?"
{{champion:80}} "What are YOU talking about?"
We all want to see what taric is talking about
Stay calm and PRAISE THE SUN!

http://i.imgur.com/xZ2sEbd.gif?noredirect

{{champion:80}} I spend twice the time training and fighting as you do grooming Demacian oathbreaker

{{champion:44}} Is that why you wear a helmet Artisan?

http://funnyjunk.com/channel/lol-channel/Ohhhh/pNLiLcA/
{{champion:80}} Somebody is gonna get kicked down a well
This looks like it's about to turn into something I wanna watch and possibly participate in.
The sun. Do you praise it?

If she's my Sunpai, what do people call Diana?

https://moonpie.com/templates/moonpie_site/assets/img/personalized-moonpie-box-sarasota.png
o-o you actually drew these I r8 8/8
{{champion:136}}: "You and Diana embody the same light. Typical Targon redundancy." :)
{{champion:136}} "And there kids you are all going to witness an <Eclipse>"

{{champion:89}} Praise the sun and you shall be bathed in it's holy light.
{{champion:82}} : I praise the Shadow's cold embrace, the sun hold's no place here.
{{champion:238}} Finally someone agree's with me, take that you balance loving ninja.
{{champion:98}} Without the sun their can be no shadow's.
{{champion:82}} +{{champion:238}} ..... NOOOOO all my beliefs I have embraced in the past minute are now in question, how shall we go on.
{{champion:131}} Easy pray to the moon it only casts a minute amount of light or not at all bathing the world in shadow's, much more than the sun could achieve.
{{champion:89}} Why, how dare you accuse the sun being better than the moon.
{{champion:131}} It's not an accusation if it's a fact.
{{champion:82}} +{{champion:238}} Praise the moon, Praise the moon, Praise the moon.
{{champion:131}} : I think i win the round Leona.
{{champion:89}} Oh really now, well then how about we go and ask the most knowing champion in the league?
{{champion:131}} Oh and pray tell who is that?
{{champion:89}} That would be the one the only immortal Zilean.
{{champion:131}} Let;s go then.
*later at zilean's*
{{champion:131}} +{{champion:89}} Zilean open this door up this very instant.
{{champion:26}} hold your horses i'm moving as fast as I can.
*opens door*
{{champion:26}} Now what could you possibly want?
{{champion:89}} Me and diana are arguing about which is better the moon or the sun, clearly the sun we would just like you to confirm it.
{{champion:131}} What she meant to say clearly the moon is better.
*both look at eachother shooting lightning between themselves.*
{{champion:26}} Girs, girls calm down their is no need to fight in here, I can easily tell you which is the better of two.
{{champion:89}} *please be the sun please be the sun*
{{champion:131}} *please be the moon please be the moon*
{{champion:26}} The awnser is.... Neither, now hear me out, the reason why the sun is good is because it helps nourish the crops we sustain upon, but too much son and everything would grow too rampant hence the necessity of the moon, meaning their need to be perfect balance between the two.
*hears off in the distance finally someone agrees with the kinkou*
{{champion:89}} +{{champion:131}} .... *zilean looks at them with a kind grandfatherly smile* 
{{champion:89}} You crazy old coot I knew we never should've went here.
{{champion:131}} You're right lets go ask the person who flies with the stars, maybe he will know.
*goes to summoner's rift and find's Aurelion sol*
{{champion:89}} Aurelion we need your help, we are trying to find out what is better the sun or the moon.
{{champion:136}} Clearly it's the sun star's are so delicious sadly I wont be able to eat that one for a few thousand years after it dies.
{{champion:89}} Wait what the sun's going to die?
{{champion:136}} Uhhh no, oh would you look at the time I have a meeting with uuh,,, with uuh... 
{{champion:131}} +{{champion:89}} with who? *looks threateningly at him.
{{champion:136}} uuum uuh *spots Pantheon* Ah pantheon my friend just who i was looking for let's go get a drink shall we.
{{champion:80}} uum i thought you hated me?
{{champion:136}} whaat no, I have seen the error of my ways let's go get a drink now. *looks nervously back at leona and diana*
{{champion:80}} *follows aurelians gaze then preceed's to whisper* why didn't you say they were here in the first place. *normal volume* ah my old friend let's get out of here and catch up.
{{champion:89}} Why can no one tell us which is better the sun or the moon, it must be your attitude diana. cold and unforgiving just like the moon.
{{champion:131}} Excuse me, at least i'm not hot headed as you are. *storms off*
{{champion:89}} Hehehe the sun shall always triumph over the moon.



The end. It's amazing what you can accomplish when you can't sign into league of legends XD.
Aurelion would probably repeat that part about the sun dying.  You really think he fears an aspect when he literally blew one up in "collateral damage"?

> {{champion:89}}   Why, how dare you accuse the sun being better than the moon.

Damn, she just can't seem to be happy no matter what people say, can she.

Why, how dare you accuse the sun being better than the moon.

- Leona 2k16
You mean you don't want the magnifying glass and threats? Makes it all the more interesting! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

undyne undying? from undertale?
why is leona and diana doing lesbian action while you talk about undertale? what why wtf?
... Even Aurelion Sol says this sun is lame and he made the damn thing. The sun also ruins Werewolves and Vampires...
